title: Firewalking
body:
What does it mean to walk through fire?
Firewalking, in its simplest form refers to someone walking across a fire with bare feet. However, it is so much more than that. It is a metaphor for conquering fear, conquering oneself and breaking through. Fire is a power of nature. Across many cultures fire has always carried significance, and firewalking is a practice that has been taking place for thousands of years.
Meet Ceri and Beatrix, firewalking instructors at Shambala Retreat in Rustenburg, Northwest, South Africa. They take us on a journey right from the beginning, from starting the fire and the intentions that are set for the entire process, to mentally and physically preparing for walking across fire.
teaser: Firewalking, in its simplest form refers to someone walking across a fire with bare feet. However, it is so much more than that. It is a metaphor for conquering fear, conquering oneself and breaking through.
cast: Beatrix vd Spuy, Ceri James, Bongolethu Kabingesi

title: Deep Psilocybin Journey
body:
How can psilocybin therapy transform your perceptions? 
Psilocybin mushrooms are commonly known as magic mushrooms.  After ingestion, people have reported that they are taken on a journey of connection, to themselves and to nature. The dosage dictates how far the person goes on their inward journey: some experience a connection to a power much greater than themselves experiencing a powerful shift and transformation in this process. 

Practitioner/Shaman Gary explains the process of a psilocybin journey to face past and present challenges in the journey to the inward self.
teaser: How can psilocybin therapy transform your perceptions? Explore a journey to the inward self with a shamanistic practitioner.

title: Conscious Breathing
body:
Conscious breathing is the direct awareness of breath.

Our breathing is controlled consciously or unconsciously. Mindfulness and awareness training uses conscious breathing to increase awareness and body consciousness. 
Breath Monk Aumji is a breath coach based in Plettenburg Bay, Western Cape, South Africa. 

Amuji takes us through the different techniques of breathing and how the different breath movements give different results. Learn how the art of breath can release past and present frustrations, bringing in peace and acceptance. Feeling more energized and refreshed, it is described as a way for the mind to be awakened and the body to become more relaxed, as if entering a psychedelic state.
teaser: Our breathing is controlled consciously or unconsciously. Mindfulness and awareness training uses conscious breathing to increase awareness and body consciousness.

title: Cacao Ceremony
body:
Can chocolate really heal the heart? Cacao rituals were used for centuries in ancient American cultures. Many tribes believed that the Cacao pod was the key ingredient in the creation of humanity. It is said to be the ultimate heart opener, both physically and spiritually.

Having a deep passion for chocolate, Caryn Amber Rich, eating up to almost nine chocolates per day, instantly fell in love with IxCacao, known as the Goddess of Abundance. Not realizing the problems, hurt and pain Caryn was feeling with her heart she realized that IxCacao was assisting in opening her heart to become vulnerable and drop the barriers that held her from others. Caryn had the most profound experience attending her first IxCacao Ceremony. She describes it as finding the spirit of her heart. 

Caryn, now a Cacao Weaver and Healer, shares the process and steps of an IxCacoa ceremony.
teaser: Can chocolate really heal the heart? Learn about the spiritual power of chocolate, or cacao. Dating back to the 1500’s, Cacao rituals were used for centuries in ancient American cultures.
cast: Caryn Amber Rich, Zozo Ntlangula, Yaseen Luke Wang, Ninette Nottbusch

title: Sweat Lodge
body:
Explore the sweat lodge tradition as a symbol of rebirth.

The sweat lodge based at Shambala Retreat in Rustenburg (South Africa), is inspired by Native American Indian cultures. Ceri is a Shaman who facilitates many different practices and rituals, takes us through the process of how a sweat session is done at Shambala. 

The sweat lodge is designed so that the entrance of the sweat area and fire pit is facing to the east, where the sun rises. The fire pit is prepared 4-5 hours in advance and dolomite rocks are placed in the fire. The fire keeper oversees the fire, making sure the rocks reach the correct temperature. This sweat lodge is shaped like a dome, made from wet wattle wood and willow, which is bent and shaped while wet, and then it is dried in the shape it has been molded into. The dome is covered with blankets and cloth to keep the heat inside and to create a dark environment for the ceremony to take place. The fire keeper will bring the rocks in, in five stages, sprinkling water on top to create steam. 
Sweating helps to get the blood flowing, can lead participants to deep meditation, healing, and spiritual wellness.
teaser: Explore the sweat lodge tradition as a symbol of rebirth. Sweating helps to get the blood flowing, can lead participants to deep meditation, healing, and spiritual wellness.
cast: Natalie Baxter, Andre Cillie, Mohamed Hanid, Ceri James, Bongolethu Kabingesi

title: Numerology
body:
It is believed that studying numbers and number patterns can unlock secrets to the universe, as well as the human mind. Numerous number systems have given insight into how we experience the world. But how do numbers interlink with our everyday life and experiences?

Numerology can be traced back to 500 BC, spanning from the ancient Greek Pythagorean triangle to traditional Chinese medicine. It conceptualizes a mystical relationship between numbers and occurrences. It is believed that studying numbers and number patterns can unlock secrets to the universe, as well as the human mind. Numbers harness sentiments that often give us insight into how we operate within the world. 

Having an intuitive connection to numbers, numerologist Kendal studied numbers and is now a numerologist: someone who can read numbers and determine what they mean in a person’s life. By simply looking at people’s birth dates, Kendal can tell a lot about a person. Numbers are viewed as non-prescriptive, as it is not about fortune or future telling, they are more about knowing and looking at yourself, and seeing how you show up in the world as a person, along with how to best use your numbers to your advantage for your best future.
teaser: It is believed that studying numbers and number patterns can unlock secrets to the universe, as well as the human mind. How do numbers interlink with our everyday life and experiences?

title: Psychic Medium Part 1
body:
How do psychics make connection? When one hears the term Medium, our brains automatically go to Ouija boards, tarot cards and crystal balls. However, there is more to psychics than Hollywood has lead us to believe. Mediums believe that there is no such thing as death, only a transition from the physical being to the spiritual being. Mediums facilitate connections between us and the unseen past, present and future. 

We meet Sam, who is connected to the other side. After having what is described as an awakening, Sam continued to suppress her psychic gifts. In 2005, Sam fell extremely ill and after many surgeries and not receiving any healing, she knew that there was more to what was physically wrong with her. Sam needed to embrace all her pain and trauma for her to truly connect to the other side, and she needed to accept who she was to receive the healing she needed. Sam has always known she has been able to connect to the other side from being told stories by her mother about when she was younger and how she would talk to ghosts. Being a psychic medium is the only tool that Sam uses to connect to the other side. 
Hoping to connect with her father who passed away in 2013, Ingrid, has come to see Sam. Ingrid is a Reiki master herself, helping others who have reached out to her for help, for all sorts of reasons. Ingrid believes that everything in life always connects for the greater good. 

She is embarking on a personal journey with Sam, to connect with her inner self, to find the healing and closure that she needs. Sam will work through Ingrid by connecting to Ingrid’s energy and spirit. This will help Sam to see who Ingrid really is and what kind of life she has, past, present and future. 
But will Ingrid’s father come through as she hopes? Will she find the healing and closure she needs to go forward on her journey? 
We may ask questions and hold intentions, but what we need to be reminded of is that we are not in control of the information and messages that have chosen to come through for us during these sessions.
teaser: How do psychics make connection? When one hears the term Medium, our brains automatically go to Ouija boards, tarot cards and crystal balls. However, there is more to psychics than we may believe.

title: Iboga Therapy
body:
Breaking chains from your past and present problems is no easy task. Practitioners share how therapy can help to conquer fears and negative emotions, reaching a deeper connection to the inner self.

Iboga is a plant used for ritual and ceremonial purposes in some African cultures. In todays day and age, it can be used as a treatment for opiate addiction. The experience of Ibogaine occurs in two phases: the visionary phase, and the introspective phase. This helps enable people to conquer their fears and negative emotions. Ibogaine catalyzes an alternate state of consciousness and reminiscent dreaming, while fully conscious and aware. This enables us to process our memories, life experiences and issues of trauma. The journey can last 4-6 hours.

Marouf and Anita, both practitioners of the Iboga therapy journey, met in 2017 at a Buddhist retreat. Working together at other retreats, the two decided to break away because they wanted to have a more holistic approach after the Ibogaine medicine. Wanting to help more people and give them more healing and attention, in 2018, they opened The Exclusive Ibogaine Retreat to give people the best support they can have. 
Marouf and Anita, having gone through their own iboga journeys and finding so much healing along the way, take us through the process of what all an Iboga journey involves. We go through a journey with one of their patients from the darkness of his life through to his authentic other side. 

We discover if Iboga medicine really does help one to open up and connect with your deep subconscious mind. Can it assist with stripping a person from all cultural conditioning, trauma, violence, anxiety, depression, and abuse, to really connect with the true self? Can it help to reset the mind, body and spirit?
teaser: Breaking chains from your past and present problems is no easy task. Practitioners share how therapy can help to conquer fears and negative emotions, reaching a deeper connection to the inner self.

title: Oracle Card Reading
body: In ancient times, people would travel great distances to seek out the wisdom of oracles to tell their future or seek advice. In this episode of The Other Side, we explore this modern phenomenon with expert Angelique to better understand the practice of channeling and oracle card reading. Angelique demonstrates how she tunes into her higher self and spiritual guides to access the wisdom of the akashic records and higher realms of reality. Could we all have these intuitive gifts hidden within us that are waiting to be unlocked?
teaser: In ancient times, people would travel great distances seeking the wisdom of oracles to tell their future or seek advice. In this episode of The Other Side, we explore the practices of channeling and oracle card reading with Angelique.

title: Astrology
body: In this episode of The Other Side, we explore the world of astrology with expert Rod Saskin, to understand the mysterious connection between human consciousness and the cosmos. Can our entire future and past be determined by reading into the energy of the stars and planets? It seems the more one looks into astrology, the more they see that our destiny is woven into the very fabric of the universe itself.
teaser: Can our entire future and past be determined by reading into the energy of the stars and planets? It seems the more one looks into astrology, the more they see that our destiny is woven into the very fabric of the universe itself.

title: Shamanic Hypnotherapy
body:
How can we learn from Shamanistic Practices to integrate our shadow selves to live our best daily lives? Shamanic healing was the beginning of modern hypnosis as we know it today, using plants, animals, or drumming as a guide. 

Shamans can facilitate healing to take place from your subconscious, without having to relive any negative experiences. They often help to facilitate deeper journeys beyond the veil to unleash deeper truths.
teaser: How can we learn from Shamanistic Practices to integrate our shadow selves to live our best daily lives? Shamanic healing was the beginning of modern hypnosis as we know it today, using plants, animals, or drumming as a guide.

title: Trance Dance
body: There have been many rituals and ceremonies used for thousands of years by various ancient cultures around the world to connect to their ancestors with the intention of finding healing. Of all of these, trance dance is amongst the oldest and most revered of these traditions. This entails a person tapping into the energy of their ancestors - through the practice of sacred dance rituals and music, to alter their consciousness in order to seek healing and higher wisdom. Follow the road of your ancestors and learn the techniques of unlocking your full potential.
teaser: Many rituals and ceremonies have been used for thousands of years by various ancient cultures. Trance dance is amongst the oldest and most revered of these traditions. Through this practice of sacred dance rituals and music, we can alter our consciousness in order to seek healing and higher wisdom.

title: Dowsing, Bars & Hypnotherapy
body: Meet Elmarie Castlemaine, a transpersonal and metaphysical healer, who becomes a channel and guide for her client Mandy Robbertse. Under the weight of childhood grief, Robbertse faces her subconscious to emerge into the world reborn. Witness Castlemaine break through her client's sorrow, releasing Robbertse from the darkness of trauma.
teaser: A transpersonal and metaphysical healer becomes a channel & guide to the other side.

title: Psychic Medium Part 2
body: Susan Janse Van Rensburg helps people move on from traumas to live fulfilling lives through mediumship. Van Rensburg discusses her ability to interact with the intermediate world and the events leading her to embrace her psychic abilities as she works with Nomzamo Magodla, a woman grieving the death of her mother, to find peace.
teaser: Susan Janse Van Rensburg works to help people move on from their traumas and live fulfilling lives.

title: Dream Interpretation
body: Interpreters like Peter Planicka view dreams as channels of communication, providing messages from beyond the physical world that help people face their past. Planicka and Natalie Buttress work together to unveil the messages hidden within her dreams, providing education on the benefits gained by dream interpretation.
teaser: Natalie Buttress asks Peter Planicka to interpret a prophetic dream and get guidance.

title: Near Death Experiences
body: Vicki Frick and Hendrik Potgieter, daughter and father, have both experienced the unimaginable: a near-death experience. They must face their journeys of awakening as they recount the stories of their fateful encounters with the other side. As the paths of father and daughter merge, everyone wonders how this will affect them.
teaser: Hendrik Potgieter and Vicki Frick recount their near-death experiences.
cast: Vicki Frick, Hendrik Potgieter, Elona Kauleza

title: Haunted Hotel
body: Established in 1884, the town of Matjiesfontein has a dynamic and tragic history: from war to concentration camps. Is the Lord Milner Hotel, built in a time of fear and distress, now haunted by ghosts of its past? In the midst of wandering souls, John Theunissen, Jerry Meintjies, and Luciano Justin Herder focus on work while tourist Tess Bosman looks for a fright.
teaser: Matjiesfontein’s Lord Milner Hotel is haunted by wandering souls lost in time.
cast: John Theunissen, Jerry Meintjies, Luciana Justin Herder, Tess Bosman

title: Sacred Sites
body: Charl Pienaar applies alchemy to reconnect with the land and locate sacred sites in a world of concrete jungles. Combining modern technology and ancient techniques, Pienaar's unique skills aid him in finding his roots. When Shaman Julian Arendse contacts Pienaar, together they introduce descendants of ancient cultures to their heritage.
teaser: Charl Pienaar uses modern tech & ancient techniques to reconnect with land energy.

title: Beings from Other Worlds
body: Donna Fraenkel made contact with strange yet beautiful otherworldly beings in a difficult period of her life. In the aftermath, Donna turns to Ian MacIntosh in an attempt to understand her experience. As a close friend and a psychic, MacIntosh connects with Fraenkel and solve the puzzle of their collective encounters.
teaser: To understand encounters with otherworldly beings, Donna Fraenkel turns to Ian MacIntosh.
cast: In a difficult period in her life, Donna Fraenkel made contact with strange yet beautiful otherworldly beings.

title: Hypnotherapy: For Recovery
body: As an energy healer practiced in a multitude of mediums, Diana Collins Smith accesses the subconscious mind to look deeper into illnesses and ailments. With each session bringing more surprises, Collins Smith works to heal her clients. When Michelle Rosenkrantz comes to Collins Smith for spiritual, emotional, and physical help, the energy healer becomes fully invested in the experience.
teaser: Diana Collins Smith accesses the subconscious mind to look into illnesses & ailments.

title: Shadows of Mermaids
body: Folklore, legends, and myths have an important role in society, especially for the Attaquas people of the Shadowlands. Anton Roetz describes his introduction to the culture and the stories of mermaids residing in the waterhole, while Poem Mooney discusses the importance of tribal storytelling, and Jaralow Mongo reveals a hidden cave with ancient paintings of mermaids.
teaser: Folklore, legends & myths have an important role in society for the Attaquas people.
cast: Anton Roetz, Poem Mooney, Jaralow Mongo

title: Sangoma, Bone Throwing, Divining
body: As a Sangoma, Kokektso provides traditional healing through indigenous knowledge passed through dreams and visions. Using herbal concoctions and bone throwing, this Sangoma works to remove dark energies and realign balance with the ancestors –  including an anonymous candidate who opens communication with their ancestors.
teaser: As a Sangoma, Kokektso Motale provides traditional healing through dreams & visions.

title: Evolution, Coaching & Hypnotherapy
body: Natalie Whyte spends her days in the healing arts, years after her grandparents sent her a message in a dream. With more people opening up to holistic and spiritual healing, Whyte's profession as an Evolution Coach is in high demand. When Roulla Van Rensburg comes to receive healing and guidance, little does she know that Natalie will change her life forever.
teaser: Roulla Van Rensburg receives healing & guidance from Natalie Whyte.
cast: Natalie Whyte, Stavroulla Janse Van Rensburg

title: Crystal Bowl Therapy
body: As a Holistic Healer and Practitioner, Bronwyn Teri Lewis dedicates her life to helping clients find holistic paths and happiness. When Dinel Rancho starts feeling lost and overwhelmed, she comes to Bronwyn for an alternative path forward. With the help of sound bowls and healing massages, Bronwyn and Dinel take a journey together to heal soul and body both.
teaser: With sound bowls and healing massages, Bronwyn and Dinel heal souls & bodies.
